Class Rationnel

java.lang.Object
Rationnel
public class Rationnel
extends java.lang.Object
This class for representing and manipulating rational numbers.
Author:
Eve-Anne Offredi

    Rationnel​(int n, int d)
    Check that the denominator is >0, =0 and if it is <0, the sign of the numerator will be changed
